013package org.apache.juneau.config.mod;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.IOUtils.*;
018
019/**
020 * Simply XOR+Base64 encoder for obscuring passwords and other sensitive data in INI config files.
021 *
022 * <p>
023 * This is not intended to be used as strong encryption.
024 *
025 * <ul class='seealso'>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-config.jc.ModdedEntries">Overview &gt; juneau-config &gt; Modded/Encoded Entries</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029public class XorEncodeMod extends Mod {
030
031   /** Reusable XOR-ConfigEncoder instance. */
032   public static final XorEncodeMod INSTANCE = new XorEncodeMod();
033
034   private static final String KEY = System.getProperty("org.apache.juneau.config.XorEncoder.key",
035      "nuy7og796Vh6G9O6bG230SHK0cc8QYkH");   // The super-duper-secret key
036
037   /**
038    * Constructor.
039    */
040   public XorEncodeMod() {
041      super('*', null, null, null);
042   }
043
044   @Override
045   public String apply(String value) {
046      byte[] b = value.getBytes(UTF8);
047      for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
048            int j = i % KEY.length();
049         b[i] = (byte)(b[i] ^ KEY.charAt(j));
050      }
051      return "{" + base64Encode(b) + "}";
052   }
053
054   @Override
055   public String remove(String value) {
056      value = value.trim();
057      value = value.substring(1, value.length()-1);
058      byte[] b = base64Decode(value);
059      for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
060         int j = i % KEY.length();
061         b[i] = (byte)(b[i] ^ KEY.charAt(j));
062      }
063      return new String(b, UTF8);
064   }
065
066   @Override
067   public boolean isApplied(String value) {
068      return startsWith(value, '{') && endsWith(value, '}');
069   }
070}
